Field Summary
private static int CLOSE_OBJECT_DISTANCE
          The maximal distance (cm) at which a object is to be considered
private static int FILTER_SIZE
          Size of the filter used to detect the end of an object
private static int MINIMAL_OBJECT_SIZE
          If an object is detected in less than MINIMAL_OBJECT_SIZE consecutive reads, it is considered nothing but bad readings

findCloseObjects

public Block[] findCloseObjects()
Returns the position and the size of the objects around the robot.

Returns:
a list of objects detected.

findNextObjectIndex

private int findNextObjectIndex(int offset,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> distances)
Find the index of the distance sample at which an object is detected

Parameters:
offset - index offset at which start the search for the object
distances - the list of distance samples
Returns:
the index of the sample at which the object is first detected or -1 if no object found

findEndObjectIndex

private int findEndObjectIndex(int objectOffset,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> distances)
Find the distance sample at which the object is ending.

Parameters:
objectOffset - the index offset at which the object starts
distances - the list of distance samples
Returns:
the index of the distance sample where the object ends

pointPosition

private Coordinate pointPosition(int angle,
                                 int distance)
Gets the X and Y position of a point on the competition ground based on its angle and distance from the robot

Parameters:
angle - the angle position of the point from the robot (degrees)
distance - the distance of the point from the robot (cm)
Returns:
the position of the point on the competition ground
